General.Name: Hana Must SPAC 2
General.Description: SELVAS Healthcare, Inc. manufactures and sells medical diagnostic devices and visual aids products. The company develops, manufactures, and sells body composition analyzers and automatic blood pressure monitors. It provides rehabilitation medical auxiliary equipment under HIMS brand name, as well as provides health solution under ACCUNIQ brand name. The company was formerly known as Jawon Medical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SELVAS Healthcare, Inc. in September 2016. SELVAS Healthcare, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Daejeon, South Korea. SELVAS Healthcare, Inc. is a subsidiary of Selvas AI Inc.

6.Name: Mr. Seung-Ho  Kim
6.Title: MD, Head of Devel. & Production Division and Director of Research Center
